parameter.name: url
parameter.label: Database URL
parameter.description:
Defines required database URL and optional path and parameters.
Required database url like 'jdbc::[:;]'
Parameter 'service' is used as identifier for the selected jdbc driver. URL-Examples:
jdbc:derby:./testDerby;create=true
jdbc:h2:./testH2
jdbc:hsqldb:./testHsqlDb
jdbc:mariadb://192.168.0.1:3306/testMariadb
jdbc:mysql://192.168.0.1:3306/testMysql
jdbc:postgresql://192.168.0.1:5432/testPostgresql
jdbc:sqlite:./testSqlite.db

parameter.name: user
parameter.label: Database User
parameter.description: Defines optional database user.

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Database Password
parameter.description: Defines optional database password.

parameter.name: sqltype.CALL
parameter.label: SqlType CALL
parameter.description:
Overrides used JDBC/SQL datatype for CALL
(optional, default: "VARCHAR(200)").
General about JdbcTypes/SqlTypes see: https://mybatis.github.io/mybatis-3/apidocs/reference/org/apache/ibatis/type/JdbcType.html
see: http://www.h2database.com/html/datatypes.html
see: http://www.postgresql.org/docs/9.5/static/datatype.html

parameter.name: tableNamePrefix
parameter.label: Tablename Prefix String
parameter.description:
Tablename prefix string
(optional, default: "item").
For migration from MYSQL-Bundle set to 'Item'.

parameter.name: tableUseRealItemNames
parameter.label: Tablename Realname Generation
parameter.description:
Enables Tablename prefix generation per Items realname
(optional, default: disabled -> "Tablename Prefix String" is used).
If true, 'Tablename Prefix String' is ignored.

parameter.name: tableIdDigitCount
parameter.label: Tablename Suffix ID Count
parameter.description:
Tablename Suffix ID Count
(optional, default: 4 -> 0001-9999).
For migration from MYSQL-Bundle set to 0.

parameter.name: rebuildTableNames
parameter.label: Tablename Rebuild
parameter.description:
Rename existing tables using 'Tablename Realname Generation' and 'Tablename Suffix ID Count', (optional, default: disabled).
USE WITH CARE! Deactivate after renaming is done!

parameter.name: maximumPoolSize
parameter.label: Connections Max Pool Size
parameter.description:
Overrides max pool size in database connection.
(optional, default: differs each Database)
https://github.com/brettwooldridge/HikariCP/issues/256

parameter.name: minimumIdle
parameter.label: Connections Min Idle
parameter.description:
Overrides min idle database connections.
(optional, default: differs each Database)
https://github.com/brettwooldridge/HikariCP/issues/256

parameter.name: enableLogTime
parameter.label: Timekeeping Enable
parameter.description:
Enables a time, performance measurement.
(optional, default: disabled)
